<JD_START>
Job Title: Photographers (Retail/eCommerce)

Location: South Deerfield, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Our client, a leading global consumer goods company, is looking for a Photographer to join their team for a long-term freelance project. The role will be onsite at their studio in South Deerfield, MA. This role is expected to be 40 hours per week, starting in May 2024, lasting 8-11 months.

A successful applicant will be responsible for capturing high-quality images within the eCommerce, lifestyle, CPG, or retail space. Responsibilities include setting up and managing shoots, providing art direction, and ensuring that all images are of the highest quality. The Photographer will also be responsible for providing packaging consulting and assisting with photo production.

You must have a strong portfolio of photography work to show, have excellent communication skills, and a keen eye for detail. You must also have a thorough understanding of photo production processes and be able to work independently with minimal supervision.

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in photography or related field5+ years of experience as a professional photographerExpertise in digital and film photographyExperience shooting products inside of glass with examples to showStrong portfolio of photography workKnowledge of photo production processesKnowledge of packaging consulting and art direction

BenefitsCreative Circle's Freelance Employee benefits package includes eligibility for Minimum Essential Coverage (MEC) medical plan, dental/vision/term life package, discount prescription program, critical illness, accident, tele-behavioral health, and 401(k) plan. Sick leave is provided to Candidates whose assignment work location is in a state or city subject to sick leave laws. A Minimum Value (MV) PPO medical plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and paid holiday eligibility are based on length and dates of service.

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

ldangelo@creativecircle.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : LD9-1798222 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Lucy D'Angelo - Recruiter, National Delivery - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CreativeCircle is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CreativeCircle will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CreativeCircle is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

,

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
